name: Beariary
description:
Welcome to Beariary, a game about bears making honey! You can destroy, craft and build you very own apiary.  Be sure to put flowers around your apiaries to increase its honey quality, there is even a super rare one that can be sold for high prices at your honey stand! Be sure to chill, make an apiary, and most importantly, make sure to get to sleep in the cave so the items in your honeystand can sell overnight!

CONTROLS  (you can edit the controls in the settings menu)

  • W - walk up
  • S - walk down
  • A - walk left
  • D - walk right
  • E - crafting menu (hold mouse still on item to view recipe!)
  • Left Click - Shake (brake stuff)
  • Right Click - Use (Place/harvest/sell)

This game was made for the cozy autumn jam 2022, and was overscoped for the 2 weeks available. We are planning on a complete polished, complete version in the future, so stay tuned!
